text: Edgar Doud Whitcomb (November 6, 1917 - February 4, 2016) was an American politician. He was the 43rd Governor of Indiana. He served from 1969 to 1973. Whitcomb was born in Hayden, Indiana. Whitcomb died February 4, 2016 at his home in Rome, Indiana from heart failure at the age of 98. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1917 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Indiana Category:Governors of Indiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Military people from Indiana
title: Edgar Whitcomb
